CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 3, 1959, pg. 2 reads: "Mother Recovers - Mrs. Florence Fletcher, mother of the family of which a raging $5,000 Christmas night fire took her husband and three children is in fair condition in Braddock General Hospital, where she is shown being comforted by a nurse. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Florence Fletcher, lying in hospital bed with nurse, possibly Ms Boden, leaning over, in Braddock General Hospital
